testcase.name: Create a Comment
testcase.failure:
Given jsonplaceholder service is up and running.............................failed When I create a new comment with details "9", "Lateef Abdulsalam", "Abdulsalam1220@gardner.biz" and "I like this post" using post method.skipped Then I should get status code of 201 and "9", "Lateef Abdulsalam", "Abdulsalam1220@gardner.biz" and "I like this post".skipped
